page.title: 03A woman's Morning
page.content: I wake up at 6:30 a.m.and go down stairs to make breakfast for my daughter Jackie and myself.We usually have cereal and toast for our first meal of the day.I get the car out of the garage and take Jackie into Axbridge where she gets a lift to Taunton.Jackie is training to be a Nursery Nurse at college in Taunton.When I return home I wash the dishes,tidy up the house,and water all the plants.I give my dog Pepi some food and lock up the house carefully.At 8:40 a.m.I drive 5 miles to work at Weare School.I arrive at 9:00 a.m.and quickly start to get ready for the day ahead.There are 9 children in the unit where I work.They have difficulty in hearing and come from a long way to have help with their problem.I check that each child's hearing aid is working.
